subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: More than 50 years ago, a young man's first, harsh exposure to the reality of motor racing, and of life itself -- triumph and disaster, joy and despair -- at the British Grand Prix and then the German Grand Prix.
snippet: More than 50 years ago, a young man's first, harsh exposure to the reality of motor racing, and of life itself -- triumph and disaster, joy and despair -- at the British Grand Prix and then the German Grand Prix.
